body_html:
Actually on second thought the tensorflow runtime uses threads and it's unlikely that liberal use of multiprocessing will work here.
…

body:
Actually on second thought the tensorflow runtime uses threads and it's
unlikely that liberal use of multiprocessing will work here.

On Tue, Aug 8, 2017 at 10:54 PM, yj8907 <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> Could you explain in more detail how
> to wrap a forking_py_func around py_func to do multiprocessing? Thanks
>
